name: EY-Parthenon
tagline: Former Booz & Company—pure strategy arm within Big 4
description: EY-Parthenon is a transformative strategy and transactions consultancy with over 25,000 strategy professionals spanning more than 150 countries. The firm focuses on delivering solutions that work in practice, not just on paper.
known_for: Formerly the independent Parthenon Group founded by ex-Bain consultants, joined EY in 2014 to become its strategy practice. Known for pragmatic, execution-focused strategy work that bridges the 'what' and 'how' questions. Strong private equity practice and reputation for rigorous analytical work. Culture emphasizes hiring 'smart, nice, and driven' people.
career_path: Associate (2 yrs) → Consultant (2-3 yrs) → Manager (3 yrs) → Principal (3-4 yrs) → Director (4+ yrs) → Partner

recruiting.process: Application → Phone Screen (behavioral, 30 min) → First Round (1 case + 1 fit/behavioral, 30 min each) → Final Round (1 case + 1 fit/behavioral + 1 group case, 30-45 min each)
recruiting.unique: Uses group case exercise in final round. Two-case staffing model where consultants work on two teams simultaneously. Process takes 2-12 weeks total.
recruiting.timeline: Applications open year-round, close when filled. 1 week to hear back after applying, 2+ weeks between phone screen and in-person rounds. Offer decisions within 1 week after final round.

byu.tip: Strong BYU presence with 41 combined current alumni. EY-Parthenon actively recruits from target schools.
